metadata.title: CVE-2021-3612 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds memory write flaw was found in the Linux kernel's joystickdevices subsystem in versions before 5.9-rc1, in the way the user callsioctl JSIOCSBTNMAP. This flaw allows a local user to crash the system orpossibly escalate their privileges on the system. The highest threat fromthis vulnerability is to confidentiality, integrity, as well as systemavailability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
